about_the_game:
Gradient Flow Is A Free-to-Play Minimalist Racing Game.

Race against the timer, your friends in split-screen or other players online.
Gradient Flow features a custom physics engine designed to provide the smoothest and the most consistent driving experience possible.
All playable racetracks are made using the in-game editor and players can easily share their creations and browse other players' creations.
Free-to-Play users can also create and join online lobbies on dedicated servers.
By opting for the subscription model, players gain the access to global verified leaderboards on every track and gain access to subscriber only lobbies for a more competitive experience.
Players can also choose to customize their vehicle appearance through in-app purchase although some customization is also available to Free-to-Play users.
